problem:
问题4. 已知 $x 、 y 、 z$ 是非负实数,且 $x+y+z=1$, 求证:
$$
0 \leqslant x y+y z+z x-2 x y z \leqslant \frac{7}{27} .
$$
solution: 不妨设 $z<\frac{1}{2}$, 作三角代换: $x=\sin ^2 \alpha \cos ^2 \beta, y=\cos ^2 \alpha \cos ^2 \beta, z=\sin ^2 \beta$, 则 $x y+y z+z x-2 x y z=x y(1-z)+z(x+y-x y)=\sin ^2 \alpha \cos ^2 \alpha \cos ^6 \beta+ \sin ^2 \beta \cos ^2 \beta\left(1-\sin ^2 \alpha \cos ^2 \alpha \cos ^2 \beta\right) \geqslant 0$. 同理 $x y+y z+z x-2 x y z=x y(1- 2 z)+z(x+y)=\sin ^2 \alpha \cos ^2 \alpha \cos ^4 \beta \cos 2 \beta+\frac{1}{4} \sin ^2 2 \beta=-\frac{1}{4} \sin ^2 2 \alpha \cdot \frac{1}{4} (1+2 \cos 2 \beta)^2 \cos 2 \beta+\frac{1}{4}\left(1-\cos ^2 2 \beta\right) \leqslant \frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{16} \cos 2 \beta(1+\cos 2 \beta)^2- \frac{1}{4} \cos ^2 2 \beta=\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{32}\left[2 \cos 2 \beta(1-\cos 2 \beta)^2\right] \leqslant \frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{32} \times\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^3=\frac{7}{27}$.
